control.name: Feedback Control Design
control.description: Design of feedback control algorithms for dynamic systems

estimation.name: Dynamic Systems Estimation
estimation.description: Techniques for determining the state of an uncertain system with noisy measurements

machine_learning.name: Machine Learning
machine_learning.description: Set of algorithms that allow computers to extract and classify information from raw data

nastran.name: NX Nastran
nastran.description: NX Nastrain finite element analysis software

gd&t.name: Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing
gd&t.description: Technique for communicating important tolerances that need to be met in manufacture in mechanical drawings

projects.headline: Adaptive Observer for HDD Load Operation
projects.description: Created an Kalman filter based observer to determine the location of an HDD actuator during load and unload operations when only noisy velocity measurements are available from the motor Back EMF.

projects.headline: Embedded Servo Code API Documentation System
projects.description: Helped introduce a system for defining and revisioning the servo processor command interface along with documentation generation.

projects.headline: Helicopter Stabilization Controller
projects.description: Created a computer model of a helicopter with a main rotor and tail rotor based on a model in a paper on Kane's method, then used state linearization techniques to create a stabilizing controller that was capable of stopping the model's decent towards the ground.

projects.headline: Mechanical Design of Satellite Antennas
projects.description: Using customer specified or in house antenna cavity designs, I created a mechanical designs to fit satellite footprint and tolerances as well as withstand a launch environment

projects.headline: Safety Critical Equipment Detection Tool
projects.description: With a database of 100 000+ pieces of capital equipment in an oil and gas production facility labeled by expert engineering staff, I wrote an SVM algorithm to assist in scanning for potential equipment that had been missed being marked as safety critical. This algorithm found 20+ instances of un-marked equipment with a low false positive rate.

projects.headline: Maintenance Scheduling Algorithm
projects.description: Working with a large database of capital equipment and maintenance resourses, I helped design an algorithm that attempted to create an optimal maintenance schedule based on equipment criticality, travel distance and maintenance worker expertise.

projects.headline: Cut to Size G-Code Generating Spreadsheet
projects.description: Created a VBA enabled Excel spreadsheet that the user could input parameters for various geometries and frequencies of waveguides and g-code would automatically be generated to load into the CNC mill.

projects.headline: Linux Server Deployment Tool
projects.description: Created a python/fabric script to deploy an Ubuntu 14.04 server with nginx, email, PostgreSQL database and a Django development environment.

projects.headline: Database Error Detection Tool
projects.description: Created and implemented a program to detect errors and duplications of capital equipment based on purchasing data.

projects.headline: Haptic Paddle Hardware and Control
projects.description: Manufactured, assembled and programmed a device to provide haptic feedback on a handle using a modified Arduino programmed in C and a DC brush-less motor.

projects.headline: Maze Solving Differential Drive Robot
projects.description: Designed a Lego robot that explored, mapped and solved a maze. Was one of only 2 robot designs in the class to complete the task successfully.

projects.headline: Kalman Observer for a Balancing Robot
projects.description: Designed an Unscented Kalman Filter for estimating the position and velocity of a balancing robot from noisy gyroscope and accelerometer readings.

projects.headline: Crop Area Prediction Algorithm
projects.description: Using aerial satellite imagery from Landsat-7 and Landsat-8 satellites I created a program to detect agricultural area and predict what crops were being grown based on a trained SVM classifier and a training data set.

projects.headline: Bicycle Share Use Prediction Tool
projects.description: Wrote a program to predict how many bikes would be used in Washington DC's bike share program (Kaggle competition). Working with a team I helped implement a Support Vector Regression (SVR) algorithm that increased prediction accuracy from a linear least squares by a factor of 5.

projects.headline: Depth from De-focus Program
projects.description: Created a program that estimated the depth of a checkerboard using the amount of blur that was created by the camera

projects.headline: Automatic Resume Generator
projects.description: Developed an automatic, project based resume generator based on the skills listed in a job description. This resume was generated by it!

projects.headline: Lead of HDD Seek Subsystem Team
projects.description: Took responsibility for ensuring seek performance for mainline HDD products. This involved tuning seeks, testing performance of various mechanical systems and trouble shooting bugs in the firmware. Maintained competitive seek performance and power with industry competition.

projects.headline: Embedded Data Collection Framework
projects.description: Created a framework for collecting, archiving and visualizing performance testing data along with a GUI interface to allow everyone easy access to various routines built by the servo engineering group.

projects.headline: Correction Algorithm for Fractional Delay Input to Discrete Time Model
projects.description: Created a technique to correct the discrete time seek distance model for the effects of a fractional delay in the update current. Was implemented in latest products to reduce the amount of position error while seeking.

projects.headline: Low Frequency Controller Feature
projects.description: Developed a control feature designed to reduce / eliminate dependence on an external integrator in the control loop. Objective was to eliminate integrator windup after re-enabling the integrator at the end of a seek.

projects.headline: SCSI Device Performance Test Server
projects.description: Set up a Linux server that was connected to multiple hard drives and could be used over ssh to test the performance of a HDD over a SATA or SAS interface.

projects.headline: Improved Seek Power Reduction Code for HDD
projects.description: Refactored and fixed multiple bugs in legacy code responsible for non optimal seek power. Lowered drive power consumption by 5% during seek heavy workloads.

projects.headline: Encrypted Bar-code System
projects.description: Designed algorithms for generating encrypted QR Codes as well as an android app to read and verify them.

projects.headline: Maintenance of Linux BSP using Buildroot
projects.description: Used Buildroot software to build and update a custom Linux BSP that is the basis of many Wanco systems. Managed changes to hardware drivers, third party libraries needed for software development, patched security vulnerabilities.

projects.headline: DMS display rendering library
projects.description: Updated Wanco's NTCIP 1203v3 compliant sign rendering software library (written in C) to be compiled to Web Assembly (via emscripten) for use on the customer web portal for preview of sign displays. This ensured that the exact same message is rendered anywhere that the customer may be editing it from

certifications.name: M.S. Electrical Engineering
certifications.description: Focus on systems science, estimation and control. GPA: 3.671

work_history.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
work_history.responsibilities: Maintained and developed board support packages (BSPs) and software for multiple custom hardware boards.

work_history.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
work_history.responsibilities: In addition to the responsibilities from my previous role, I participated in technology development projects that advanced seek performance capability. Towards this end, I developed software tools to stream-line the seek tuning process as well as control algorithms for the drive firmware. I was also responsible for regression testing and bug-fixes of the seek sub-system, as well a training of new seek engineers.

work_history.title: Embedded Software Engineer II
work_history.responsibilities: In this role I was tasked with supporting product firmware development from initial prototype to manufacture. During the prototype phase, I helped integrate various code features developed by the advanced technology team into each product by: merging code, writing unit / integration tests, and debugging firmware issues that arose. Once the product entered full scale manufacturing I was tasked with troubleshooting yield and reliability issues.

work_history.title: Embedded Software Engineering Intern V
work_history.responsibilities: Supported the Servo Firmware department by making modifications to the firmware build system along with investigating new control algorithms for use in loading the heads on to the disk.

work_history.title: Contract Software Developer
work_history.responsibilities: Developed Python software to automate many of the tasks required in planning and scheduling maintenance of oil and gas production machinery.

csm.name: Colorado School of Mines
csm.description: University specializing in engineering that is focused on earth, energy and environment

custom_microwave.name: Custom Microwave
custom_microwave.description: Manufacturer of high precision antenna arrays, mostly for space operation

petrofac.name: Petrofac Facilities Management
petrofac.description: Oil and gas focused data management company specializing in facilities data management

seagate.name: Seagate Technology
seagate.description: Manufactuer of storage products, primarily Hard Disk Drives (HDDs)

wanco.name: Wanco
wanco.description: Manufactuer of dynamic message signs and other smart traffic technologies
